import { useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import { ThemeContext } from './contexts/theme' import Header from './components/Header/Header' import About from './components/About/About' import Projects from './components/Projects/Projects' import Skills from './components/Skills/Skills' import ScrollToTop from './components/ScrollToTop/ScrollToTop' import Contact from './components/Contact/Contact' import Footer from './components/Footer/Footer' import './App.css' const App = () => { const [{ themeName }] = useContext(ThemeContext) return (
) } export default App
